thread.title: Soap and shampoo maker PZ Cussons warns on full-year profit

title: Soap and shampoo maker PZ Cussons warns on full-year profit
text: March 15, 2018 / 8:03 AM / Updated 19 minutes ago Soap and shampoo maker PZ Cussons warns on full-year profit Reuters Staff 1 Min Read (Reuters) - Soap and shampoo maker PZ Cussons ( PZC.L ) said it expected profit for the full year to fall short of expectations, hurt by weakness in the UK and Nigeria. The company said it expected profit before tax to be in the range of 80 million pounds ($111.8 million) to 85 million pounds. In comparison, it reported a pretax profit, excluding items, of 88 million pounds in the year ended May 31. Reporting by Arathy S Nair in Bengaluru; Editing by Gopakumar Warrier
